title: Len Vander Zee on Sacraments, the CRC and Jordan Peterson
description:
Len Vander Zee is a retired Christian Reformed Minister who has served multiple congregations, been editor of the CRC magazine and authored a book on Sacraments. We've been friends for years and I've been wanting to have a conversation with him online about all of this stuff. Here it is. 

His book https://www.amazon.com/Christ-Baptism-Lords-Supper-Evangelical/dp/0830827862

Youtube Biologos https://youtu.be/ZqgnJ1GR8ms
